Name: Perverts Society
About the game: Perverts Society is a simulation strategy game, where you become a leader of a Perverts Society and needs to balance three factions influences and manage your budget. Do not be fulled by artwork, this is a game which requires strategic thinking to be successful leader. You just became a President of the Perverts Society, hopefully your leadership will be smooth and great and you will sail your society through all the unexpected events peacefully, but are you capable of doing that? Are you able to keep Hentai faction happy? Are you able to fulfill Bondage faction dreams? Are you able to bring happiness to members while keeping the fees low? Challenge yourself with this unique opportunity of managing Society like no other: Perverts Society! Game Features: * 3 factions management: Hentai Faction, People Faction and Bondage Faction * Budget Management - manage your money or your society will go bankrupt * Multiple skills management: Charisma, Creativity, Authority etc. * Unexpected events: Marriage, Fortune Teller etc.
